short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Providing perspective for struggling Daily Mail readers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Add a little perspective to your perusal of The Daily Mail, the 21st Century's offel spouting oracle. This extension will unobtrusively append the question "Does society care?" to the end of the most impactful Daily Mail headlines. That is all. No more, no less.

Like many things that poke fun at the Daily Mail, this was inspired by drinks outside the Joker of Penton Street and the  sense of superiority often observed amongst the recently graduated.
